Sentence.sentence: But will such contests, which are overwhelmingly dominated by Asian and white students from middle-class and affluent families become any more diverse? entry.def: Something that is white is the colour of snow or milk.

example.ex: He had nice square white teeth...
example.tran: 他的牙齿洁白而整齐，十分好看。

example.ex: Issa's white beach hat gleamed in the harsh lights...
example.tran: 伊萨的白色沙滩帽在刺眼的阳光下闪闪发亮。

entry.def: A white person has a pale skin and belongs to a race which is of European origin.

example.ex: Working with white people hasn't been a problem for me or for them...
example.tran: 和白人共事对我、对他们来说都不是个问题。

example.ex: He was white, with brown shoulder-length hair and a moustache.
example.tran: 他是个白人，留着棕色的齐肩发并蓄着小胡子。

entry.def: If someone goes white, the skin on their face becomes very pale, for example because of fear, shock, anger, or illness.
entry.tran: (因情绪变化或生病等)脸色苍白的

example.ex: Richard had gone very white, but he stood his ground...
example.tran: 理查德脸都白了，但还是坚持自己的立场。

example.ex: He turned white and began to stammer...
example.tran: 他脸色发白，说话开始结巴。

entry.def: White wine is pale yellow in colour.

example.ex: Gregory poured another glass of white wine and went back to his bedroom.
example.tran: 格雷戈里又倒了一杯白葡萄酒后回到了卧室。

entry.def: White coffee has had milk or cream added to it.

example.ex: Wayne has a large white coffee in front of him.
example.tran: 韦恩面前摆着一大杯加了牛奶的咖啡。

entry.def: White blood cells are the cells in your blood which your body uses to fight infection.
People who believe in white magic believe it is possible to use magic to do good things.

example.ex: They claim to be white witches.
example.tran: 她们自称是善良的女巫。

entry.def: The white of an egg is the transparent liquid that surrounds the yellow part called the yolk.
The white of someone's eye is the white part that surrounds the coloured part called the iris.
Whites are white clothes that you wear for playing some sports, for example tennis or cricket.

example.ex: There was a Frenchman sitting at the next table, immaculate in tennis whites.
example.tran: 邻桌坐着位法国人，穿着非常整洁的白色网球服。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality or state of the achromatic color of greatest lightness (bearing the least resemblance to black)
1. being of the achromatic color of maximum lightness; having little or no hue owing to reflection of almost all incident light;
2. of or belonging to a racial group having light skin coloration;
3. free from moral blemish or impurity; unsullied;
4. marked by the presence of snow;

sentences.sentence: "the white hills of a northern winter"
"under segregation there were even white restrooms and white drinking fountains"
"a lily-white movement which would expel Negroes from the organization"

means.word_mean: 8. of a surface; not written or printed on;
9. (of coffee) having cream or milk added
12. ash-colored or anemic looking from illness or emotion;

sentences.sentence: "lips...livid with the hue of death"- Mary W. Shelley

means.word_mean: 13. of summer nights in northern latitudes where the sun barely sets;

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English hwīt, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch wit and German weiss, also to wheat
